name: Azure Vision GPT-4o
description: Converts an image into Base64 then processes it and generates responses based on the prompt given, using Azure OpenAI GPT-4o. (Amir) (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

image_file.name: image_file
image_file.info: Supported file types: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif

code.value:
import base64
import requests
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.io import FileInput, Output
from axiestudio.base.models.model import LCModelComponent
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.memory import store_message
from axiestudio.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI


class AzureVisionComponent(LCModelComponent):
    display_name: str = "Azure Vision"
    description: str = "Processes an image and generates responses based on the image using Azure OpenAI GPT-4O."
    icon = "üëÅÔ∏è"
    name = "AzureVisionComponent"
    IMAGE_FILE_TYPES = ["jpg", "jpeg", "png", "bmp", "tiff", "gif"]

    inputs = LCModelComponent._base_inputs + [
        FileInput(
            name="image_file",
            display_name="Image File",
            file_types=IMAGE_FILE_TYPES,
            info=f"Supported file types: {', '.join(IMAGE_FILE_TYPES)}",
            required=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(name="prompt", display_name="Prompt", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="azure_endpoint", display_name="Azure Endpoint", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="azure_deployment", display_name="Deployment Name", required=True, value="gpt-4o"),
        MessageTextInput(name="api_key", display_name="API Key", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="max_tokens", display_name="Max Tokens", required=True, value="300"),
        MessageTextInput(name="session_id", display_name="Session ID", required=False),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="response_message", method="get_response_message"),
    ]

    def convert_to_base64(self, image_file_path: str) -> str:
        """Convert the provided image file to Base64."""
        with open(image_file_path, "rb") as file:
            encoded_string = base64.b64encode(file.read()).decode("utf-8")
        return encoded_string

    def get_response_message(self) -> Message:
        """Main function to process the image and generate the response message compatible with ChatOutput."""
        # Retrieve the inputs
        image_file = self.image_file
        prompt = self.prompt
        azure_endpoint = self.azure_endpoint
        deployment_name = self.azure_deployment
        api_key = self.api_key
        max_tokens = self.max_tokens
        session_id = self.session_id or self.graph.flow_id

        # Convert the image to Base64
        base64_image_data = self.convert_to_base64(image_file)
        print(f"Base64 Image Data Length: {len(base64_image_data)}")

        headers = {
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
            "api-key": api_key,
        }

        payload = {
            "messages": [
                {
                    "role": "user",
                    "content": [
                        {"type": "text", "text": prompt},
                        {"type": "image_url", "image_url": {"url": f"data:image/jpeg;base64,{base64_image_data}"}}
                    ],
                },
            ],
            "max_tokens": int(max_tokens),
        }

        endpoint_url = f"{azure_endpoint}/openai/deployments/{deployment_name}/chat/completions?api-version=2023-05-15"

        print("Payload sent to API:", payload)

        # Make the API request
        response = requests.post(
            endpoint_url,
            headers=headers,
            json=payload,
        )

        # Check for HTTP errors
        if response.status_code != 200:
            print(f"Error: API request failed with status code {response.status_code}. Response: {response.text}")
            return ""

        print("API Response:", response.text)

        # Extract the response content
        try:
            response_data = response.json()
            response_content = response_data.get('choices', [{}])[0].get('message', {}).get('content', '')
        except ValueError as e:
            print("Error decoding JSON:", e)
            return ""

        if not response_content:
            print("Warning: No content returned from the response.")

        # Create a Message object compatible with ChatOutput
        message = Message(
            text=response_content,
            sender=MESSAGE_SENDER_AI,
            sender_name=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI,
            session_id=session_id,
        )

        # Optionally store the message
        store_message(
            message,
            flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
        )

        # Set the status of the component and return the message
        self.status = message
        return message

system_message.info: System message to pass to the model.

import base64
import requests
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.io import FileInput, Output
from axiestudio.base.models.model import LCModelComponent
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.memory import store_message

class AzureVisionComponent(LCModelComponent):
    display_name: str = "Azure Vision"
    description: str = "Processes an image and generates responses based on the image using Azure OpenAI GPT-4O."
    icon = "üëÅÔ∏è"
    name = "AzureVisionComponent"
    IMAGE_FILE_TYPES = ["jpg", "jpeg", "png", "bmp", "tiff", "gif"]

    inputs = LCModelComponent._base_inputs + [
        FileInput(
            name="image_file",
            display_name="Image File",
            file_types=IMAGE_FILE_TYPES,
            info=f"Supported file types: {', '.join(IMAGE_FILE_TYPES)}",
            required=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(name="prompt", display_name="Prompt", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="azure_endpoint", display_name="Azure Endpoint", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="azure_deployment", display_name="Deployment Name", required=True, value="gpt-4o"),
        MessageTextInput(name="api_key", display_name="API Key", required=True),
        MessageTextInput(name="max_tokens", display_name="Max Tokens", required=True, value="300"),
        MessageTextInput(name="session_id", display_name="Session ID", required=False),
    ]

        Output(display_name="Message", name="response_message", method="get_response_message"),

    def convert_to_base64(self, image_file_path: str) -> str:
        """Convert the provided image file to Base64."""
        with open(image_file_path, "rb") as file:
            encoded_string = base64.b64encode(file.read()).decode("utf-8")
        return encoded_string

    def get_response_message(self) -> Message:
        """Main function to process the image and generate the response message compatible with ChatOutput."""
        # Retrieve the inputs
        image_file = self.image_file
        prompt = self.prompt
        azure_endpoint = self.azure_endpoint
        deployment_name = self.azure_deployment
        api_key = self.api_key
        max_tokens = self.max_tokens
        session_id = self.session_id or self.graph.flow_id

        # Convert the image to Base64
        base64_image_data = self.convert_to_base64(image_file)
        print(f"Base64 Image Data Length: {len(base64_image_data)}")

        headers = {
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
            "api-key": api_key,
        }

        payload = {
            "messages": [
                {
                    "role": "user",
                    "content": [
                        {"type": "text", "text": prompt},
                        {"type": "image_url", "image_url": {"url": f"data:image/jpeg;base64,{base64_image_data}"}}
                    ],
                },

            "max_tokens": int(max_tokens),
        }

        print("Payload sent to API:", payload)

        # Make the API request
        response = requests.post(
            endpoint_url,
            headers=headers,
            json=payload,
        )

        # Check for HTTP errors
        if response.status_code != 200:
            print(f"Error: API request failed with status code {response.status_code}. Response: {response.text}")
            return ""

        print("API Response:", response.text)

        # Extract the response content
        try:
            response_data = response.json()
            response_content = response_data.get('choices', [{}])[0].get('message', {}).get('content', '')
        except ValueError as e:
            print("Error decoding JSON:", e)
            return ""

        if not response_content:
            print("Warning: No content returned from the response.")

        # Create a Message object compatible with ChatOutput
        message = Message(
            text=response_content,
            sender=MESSAGE_SENDER_AI,
            sender_name=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI,
            session_id=session_id,
        )

        # Optionally store the message
        store_message(
            message,
            flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
        )

        # Set the status of the component and return the message
        self.status = message
        return message
